usage_conditions: All questions and packets are either GPT-5 AI generated or from https://www.quizbowlpackets.com/
GeneralInformation.eligibility: All participants, but will be played according to NAQT rules and format.

team.captain_requirement: Each team must designate a captain prior to the beginning of the game.

individual.clarification: A single player may compete in tournaments alongside teams or other individuals.

Registration.notes: Teams must designate their captain during registration. If individuals play, the sole player is automatically the captain.

round_robin_tournament.structure: Round robin preliminary stage followed by a championship stage

championship_stage.advancement: Top 2 teams/individuals from preliminary stage advance

single_elimination_tournament.clarification: Participants play to determine a champion; if a participant loses once, they are eliminated.

double_elimination_tournament.clarification: Participants play to determine a champion; there is a winners bracket and a losers bracket.

single_round_mode.structure: Participants play one round consisting of tossups and bonuses.

procedures.first_quarter_tiebreaker: If the score is tied at the end of the first quarter, individual tossups will be asked until there is clearly one participant in the lead.
procedures.bonus_round_choice: At the end of the first quarter, the participant in the lead chooses to play the bonus round first or defer first choice to the fourth quarter.
procedures.end_of_game_tiebreaker: At the end of the fourth quarter, if there is a tie, individual tossups will be asked until there is a clear winner.

single_round_mode.clarification: This same tiebreaker procedure applies to all rounds in both single and tournament play.

player_vs_computer_mode.clarification: Computer opponent follows the same rules and scoring as human participants.

bonus.clarification: Bonuses consist of three related parts, thematically connected to each other but not to the tossup.

Gameplay.tossup_cycle: Begins with tossup, ends after bonus or both teams fail
Gameplay.bonus_cycle: Earned after correct tossup; each bonus consists of three related parts, thematically connected to each other but not to the tossup.
Gameplay.tiebreaker_procedure: At the end of any round (single or tournament), if scores are tied, individual tossups will be asked until there is a clear winner.
